attributes.action: Change the law to that anyone found with a knife INCL under 18's to receive a mandatory minimum of 12 months behind bars - Zero Tolerance Policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lets stop all this teenage violence.
Change the law so that anyone found with a knife (INCL Under 18's) to receive a mandatory minimum of 12 months behind bars
 They know that the current law does nothing to stop them, there is no deterrent so lets make it known that if found with a knife - you go to jail - NO QUESTIONS ASKED - its intend to maim, injur and/or murder. for 2008 we are up to 14 deaths already (its 25th May !!)
